thread.title: Redington's step down subsidiary in Gulf to distribute iPhones in UAE
thread.title_full: Redington's step down subsidiary in Gulf to distribute iPhones in UAE | Business Standard News

author: BS Reporter
title: Redington's step down subsidiary in Gulf to distribute iPhones in UAE
text:
Redington (India) Ltd has informed BSE that Redington Gulf FZE, a step-down subsidiary of the company has been appointed by Apple as a distributor for iPhones in UAE with immediate effect.

The company said that it is an important addition to Redington Gulf's Telecom distribution portfolio and it is expecting this to significantly increase its offering to customers in the smart phones category.
